Article.Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Notification.Description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out in accordance with specified articles.

Conditions.Disclosures: Communicated to each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.

Data_Subject_Information.Description: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if the data subject requests it.
